description: Two-phase strategy: Execute SQL statement and generate final report. Uses technical documentation as context for generating operational database queries.

user_query.placeholder: Show me all tables with fragmentation > 20%

sql_statement.placeholder: SELECT table_name, fragmentation_pct FROM dbc.tablesize WHERE fragmentation_pct > 20

context_topic.description: The operational context/topic for question generation (e.g., 'performance tuning', 'backup procedures', 'index optimization')

document_content.description: Extracted text content from technical documentation (PDFs, guides, manuals)

table_names.description: List of tables involved in the query

mcp_tool_name.description: MCP tool to use for SQL execution

target_database.description: Target database system for SQL syntax (e.g., Teradata, PostgreSQL, MySQL)

session_id.description: All template-generated cases share this session ID

is_most_efficient.description: Template cases start as champions by default

input_tokens.description: Approximate tokens for planning phase (higher due to document context)

default_mcp_tool.description: Default MCP tool for SQL execution

default_mcp_context_prompt.description: Not used for document context (context comes from uploaded docs)

phases.goal: Generate the final report based on the query results.

usage_examples.name: Find fragmented tables
usage_examples.user_query: Show me all tables with high fragmentation
usage_examples.sql_statement: SELECT DatabaseName, TableName, CurrentPerm, PeakPerm FROM DBC.TableSize WHERE (CurrentPerm - PeakPerm) / NULLIFZERO(PeakPerm) > 0.20 ORDER BY DatabaseName, TableName
usage_examples.document_content: [Excerpt from DBA Performance Guide] Table fragmentation occurs when... Check DBC.TableSize for fragmentation metrics...

usage_examples.name: Long running queries
usage_examples.user_query: List queries running longer than 5 minutes
usage_examples.sql_statement: SELECT QueryID, UserName, StartTime, AMPCPUTime, TotalIOCount FROM DBC.QryLogV WHERE AMPCPUTime > 300 ORDER BY AMPCPUTime DESC
usage_examples.document_content: [Excerpt from Query Monitoring Guide] Monitor long-running queries using DBC.QryLogV... AMPCPUTime threshold recommendations...

usage_examples.name: Index analysis
usage_examples.sql_statement: SELECT DatabaseName, TableName FROM DBC.Tables WHERE TableKind = 'T' AND IndexType = 'N' ORDER BY DatabaseName, TableName
usage_examples.document_content: [Excerpt from Index Best Practices] Tables without primary indexes... Check DBC.Tables for IndexType...
